title: Syrup Induces Pumpkin-Spiced Fever Dreams
teaser: Hugh Merwin, an editor at Grub Street, bought a 63-ounce jug of pumpkin spice syrup and put it in just about everything he ate for four days. As he tells NPR's Scott Simon, it did not go well.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
